page.title: 18Housing
page.content: The houses in this area lie mainly in the village of Tholthorpe although there are farm houses away from the village. Most farms have tied cottages for their workers. There are 6 council owned houses and 2 which are rented privately and there are also 3 furnished holiday houses and 3 holiday flats. The owner occupied dwellings are a mixture of old and new houses and a few bungalows. Their exteriors are finished in a great variety of styles and one feature of 10 successive houses is that their rooves are alternately tiled (red) or slated (grey)and this theme has been continued on 2 which have been recently built. Older houses have undergone modernisation inside and out some with rear extensions utilising old bricks.
